tasks.label: img:dockerhub desktop
tasks.command: make image-build-desktop image-push-desktop IMAGE_TAG=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD | sed -e 's/[^A-Za-z0-9_.-]/-/g' -e 's/^[.-]*//')-$(date +%Y.%-m%d.%H%M%S) DOCKER_USERNAME=registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/zhujingyang
